entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump What is going to happen when the Coronavirus hits the overcrowded, unsanitary, understaffed child concentration camps your administration is running? You've created virtual incubators for infectious disease and filled them with children you took from their parents.
